paragraph.text: Before pursuing a career in tech, I had always worked in customer service field. Customer service mindset

subtitle: A Meme Queen, A Team Builder, and an Organizer

paragraph.text: I may come off as introverted and shy at first, but once the ice is broken, I'm a constant flow of idea, a ball energy, and a super fun team member to work with.
I am also known as being extremely organized as I love to keep my work space clean, and making documentation so that I have something to reference to in the future.
